main.java.networking

Class SudokuServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.networking.SudokuServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SudokuServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is responsible for creating and maintaining the game. It primarily consists of passing sockets to threads, but does keep a lot of accounting data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SudokuServer()
      Creates a Sudoku Server with the default port defined in PORT.
      SudokuServer(int port)
      Creates the Sudoku Server with the given host and port.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        Parameters:
